keyword: how many calories is in coors light beer
title: How Many Calories in Coors Light Beer?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in Coors Light beer per standard 12 oz serving, including carbs, sodium, and quick nutrition facts for light lager fans.
h1: How Many Calories in Coors Light Beer?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can or bottle, chilled, unopened; light American lager style.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and temperature; check labels for exact values as brewing processes can differ.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Coors Light beer contains 102 calories and 5 g carbs.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts for beverages, scaled to serving size.

tweaks.label: Switch to regular Coors Banquet (per beer)
Pour into 16 oz pint glass (larger serving)

faqs.q: How many calories is in one Coors Light beer?
What are the carbs in Coors Light beer?
faqs.a: About 5 g of carbohydrates per beer, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Does Coors Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Trace protein (0.9 g) and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Coors Light?
Is Coors Light lower calorie than other beers?
faqs.a: Yes, at 102 kcal, it's lighter than many regular beers (140â€“150 kcal average).
